name: Noctivy
description: A mysterious dark elf that commands both shadow magic and fairy enchantments. Its dual nature makes it unpredictable and dangerous in battle.

ability.name: Twilight Veil
ability.description: Dark moves gain +1 priority. Fairy moves heal user for 25% of damage dealt. Immune to status conditions at night.

moves.name: Shadow Charm
moves.description: A charming dark spell that may confuse and lower special attack.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Attacks with the power of the moon. May lower special attack.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: Releases a horrible aura. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Mystical Barrier
moves.description: Creates a mystical barrier that reflects status moves and raises both defenses.

habitat: Ancient moonlit forests and shadow realms
